description: 3 random present effects.
name: Santa's Presents

description:
A darkness element attack against all enemies which 
uses both ATK and M.ATK. Reduces the M.DEF of targets.
name: Cursed Whip Strike

description: Fire damage against all enemies.
name: Fire Breath

description:
Physical damage against one enemy.
Damage variance +/-50%. Can land critical hits.
name: Claw Fury

description:
Ryen turns into his full dragon shape. Physical stats
up. Magic down. 20% chance to go in rage.
name: Full Dragon Shape

description:
Kayelinth turns into her full dragon shape. Physical 
stats up. Magic down. 20% chance to go in rage.
name: Full Dragon Shape

description: Heals the user and gives a DEF and M.DEF buff.
name: Self-care

description: [For enemies.]
name: Wake Up!

description: Water element damage to 1 enemy.
name: Water Punch

description: Water element damage to all enemies.
name: Tsunami Punch Barrage

description:
Reduces damage taken by water and ice, gives +10% ATK 
and M.ATK, +20% AGI, and a small MP regeneration.
name: Water Boost

description: High light element damage against 1 enemy.
name: Holy Snipe

description: Damage against 1 enemy.
name: Precise Shot

description: Damage against all enemies.
name: Devestating Grenade

description: Darkness element damage against all enemies.
name: Unholy Grenade

description: Life leech damage against one enemy.
name: Life Leech Grenade

description: Damage and poison debuff against one enemy.
name: Poison Grenade

description: Chance to cause confusion between the enemys.
name: Smoke Grenade

description: Fire damage against all enemies.
name: Explosive Grenade

description: Ice damage against all enemies.
name: Ice Grenade

description: Chance to blind all enemies.
name: Flash Grenade

description: Heals all party members.
name: Holy Grenade

description:
A thunder element attack which combines physical and
magical attack power.
name: Dark Thunder

description: Ignores most of the opponents armor.
name: Cut Through

description:
Increases ATK by 35%, crit chance by 10%, and TP 
regeneration by 20%, but causes pain each turn.
name: Limit Breaker

description:
Ice damage against all enemies. Uses ATK instead of 
M.ATK. Lowers their AGI of the targets briefly.
name: False Blizzard

description:
Allows you to craft items and equipment anywhere of
the world while you're out of battle.
name: Alchemist

description:
You can select from random options to heal or buff the
entire party twice.
name: Potion Maker

description: Steals 25% of the targets MP.
name: Mana drain

description:
Channeling the willpower like a wolf gives Tsubaki 
+10% ATK and EVA, and 5% HP regeneration.
name: Willpower

description: Does damage based on the M.HP of the opponent.
name: Hard Bodyslam

description:
Physical damage. 
[For special event]
name: Spider Bite

description: Contaminats 1 enemy.
name: Atomic contamination

description:
Removes most negative states while also healing the
target.
name: Perfect Cure

description:
Greatly reduces all physical damage received for 
5 turns. Allows the use of the skill "Outbreak"
name: Human Fortress

description:
Trey breaks out of his defensive stance and goes
into an all out offensive mode.
name: Outbreak

description: [HP drain for boss enemy]
name: Life Leech

description:
All party members gain 15% evasion and are 
immune to paralysis for the duration.
name: Evasive Guidance

description: [Special thunder damage against 1 enemy.]
name: Gargoyle Spark

description:
Physical attack against 1 enemy. Decreases the
DEF of the target.
name: Stone Breaking Fist

description:
Physical damage against one enemy. Deals extra damage 
when your reputation is above 100.
name: Supported Outburst

description:
Magic wind element damage against all enemies. Deals 
extra damage when your reputation is above 100.
name: Supported Gust

description:
Heals 60% HP of all party members when your reputation 
is above 100, else 30%.
name: Supportive Shout

description: Destroys 25% of the targets MP.
name: Magic Disrupter

description:
Uses 10% of his current HP to get a permanent ATK
buff. Stacks.
name: Overload

description: Chance to poison 2 random enemies.
name: Nasty Poison

description: Wind element damage to all enemies.
name: Hurricane

description:
Prevents the target from getting healed, and makes
it a more likely target for attacks.
name: Anti-Heal

description: +40% ATK, -20 DEF
name: Dangerous Power Booster

description:
Deals thunder damage and stuns 1 enemy for 2 turns. 
The target can't be stunned again for 6 turns.
name: Stun

description:
Stuns all enemies for 1 turn. The targets can't be 
stunned again for 5 turns.
name: Group Stun

description:
Stun and DEF down by 25% for 1 enemy for 1 turn.
The target can't be stunned again for 5 turns.
name: Chain Prison

description:
Stuns 1 enemy for 1-2 turns.
[For enemies!]
name: Stunning Thunder

description: Lightning damage against 1 enemy.
name: Lightning Fist

description:
Swaps the user with a reserve party member. 
No effect when you don't have 5+ party members.
name: SWAP
